title: United States : light vehicle sales by manufacturer 2017/18
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Light vehicle sales in units.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer General Motors and 2017 had the lowest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors.

In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2018 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units among all 15 Car Manufacturers and it has the lowest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
There is a gap of 2835956.0 between the highest and lowest Light vehicle sales in units found for 2018 in Car Manufacturer General Motors and Volvo Cars North America.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Light vehicle sales in units.
In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2017 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units 2986737.0 among the 2 groups and in Tesla Motors, 2017 had the lowest Light vehicle sales in units 50067.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Light vehicle sales in units.
Out of all 2 groups, 2017 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer General Motors and 2017 had the lowest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors.

In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2018 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units among all 15 Car Manufacturers and it has the lowest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
There is a gap of 2835956.0 between the highest and lowest Light vehicle sales in units found for 2018 in Car Manufacturer General Motors and Volvo Cars North America.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 15 different Car Manufacturers on X-axis for 2 groups 2017, and 2018. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Light vehicle sales in units.

Car Manufacturer General Motors had the maximum Light vehicle sales in units among all 2 groups, and it was for 2017. The minimum Light vehicle sales in units was observed in Car Manufacturer Tesla Motors for 2017.

In Car Manufacturer General Motors, 2018 had the highest Light vehicle sales in units among all 15 Car Manufacturers and it has the lowest Light vehicle sales in units in Car Manufacturer Volvo Cars North America.
There is a gap of 2835956.0 between the highest and lowest Light vehicle sales in units found for 2018 in Car Manufacturer General Motors and Volvo Cars North America.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Light vehicle sales in units was found in case of 2017.

On average, the Car Manufacturer General Motors had the highest Light vehicle sales in units for all 2 groups 2017, and 2018. Whereas Volvo Cars North America had the lowest average Light vehicle sales in units.
